June 12, 1957
TO: N.A.E.B. Board of Directors
FROM: Burton Paulu
SUBJECT: Our comments on the abandonment of the allocations
table,(Docket 1200?)
I am enclosing a cony of the comments v/e filed in regard
to Docket 12005.
The N*A.E.B. Board voted unanimously in favor of opposing
the abandonment of this table, and also unanimously in favor
of supporting the Eberharter Bill with the amendments
suggested in my memorandum.
Lenny Marks checked carefully with JCET attorneys before
filing the statement so that the two briefs would be
supplementary, not contradictory.
